quest.name: Who Needs Words
journal: Khaishan is so worried he is on the verge of saying something.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can tell from the timidness of Khaishan's nod that he is worried by something.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Khaishan points to the north. The haste with which he extended his arm suggests there is something in that direction which requires your attention.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02753
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you so much. That was nearly the end of me. I must thank Khaishan as well for sending help.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02753
dialogue.text: I am quite impressed you understood that you were needed here. Working out exactly what the Qestir are trying to communicate is never easy.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02753
dialogue.text: They believe all words to be lies and as such never open their mouths. However, they are both loyal and honestâ”€that is why so many are more than happy to do business with them.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02753
dialogue.text: Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT02753
dialogue.text: Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The tension has finally left Khaishan's oh-so-expressive face. You take note of the message of thanks relayed via his warm gaze.
